comment: coach is very chill and easy to talk to; grading is based on midterm, final, skills test, and attendance; skills test consists of serving & overhead/forearm passing to yourself and against the wall; midterm and final are take-home; shows you the rules of the game and adds extra points to grading if you show effort in improving

Coach Scott is awesome, very chill and casual (don't call him sir, dude, or bro. Scott is fine) Wants to see your improvement more than cares about grades, but ofc wants you to show up to class and be respectful. Fosters a great environment and made class fun. Really does help you improve, but he doesn't make anything super hard or demanding.

HPE classes have tough attendance demands overall, it's not him. Scott ("Sir" is not allowed) is the literal best. My beginning volleyball class was my favorite ever. He is so fun and hilarious, while also actually coaching us to be better. Even if you're bad, he makes you a great volleyball player by the end of the semester. 10/10 no doubt
